text:
Hmm - StatsMakie says it's deprecated in favor of Makie and AlgebraOfGraphics, but the Project.toml there was just bumped to AbstractPlotting v0.15, while AlgebraOfGrapics is still on 0.14.

README also says statistical plots are now in Makie, but I can't find histogram in the docs

text: hm could be we forgot to add docs for them...AbstractPlotting.histogram should work

text: I think actually we should rename histogram so that it can be exported. It's kind of weird that it isn't like all other recipes
